H0.text: who signed the declaration of independence for maryland. Samuel Chase

H1.text: who signed the declaration of independence for maryland. Charles Carroll

H2.text: who signed the declaration of independence for maryland. Thomas Stone

H3.text: who signed the declaration of independence for maryland. William Paca

A4.text: He was a signer of the United States Declaration of Independence in 1776.

A5.text: Paca-Carroll House at St. John's College is named for Paca and fellow signer of the Declaration of Independence, Charles Carroll.

A6.text: He signed the United States Declaration of Independence as a delegate for Maryland.

A7.text: On May 15, 1776, he voted in favor of drafting a declaration of independence, in spite of restrictions from the Maryland convention that prevented their delegates from supporting it.
